\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{15307130224 GuoZhen She}
\subsection*{15307130224 GuoZhen She}

\begin{lstlisting}
quantity = 10;


% Initialization
A = rand(quantity);
A = A'*A
b = randn(quantity,1)


% Gradient descent
[x, norm_rk, k] = GD(A,b);
figure(1)
plot(norm_rk(1,1:k));
xlabel("k");
ylabel("norm(r_k)");
title("Normal Gradient");


% Gradient descent
a = 3
[x, norm_rk, k] = CG(A,b);
figure(2)
plot(norm_rk(1,1:k));
xlabel("k");
ylabel("norm(r_k)");
title("Conjugate Gradient");
\end{lstlisting}
